attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This app stole my house my tv and my pet fish! It took my brother 😨 please do not download your pet terradagtle will die and also your bf/gf 🤬 I am not happy with this app😡 it will make you mad 😠 hands down worst app I have downloaded my pet fish is not safe my house is gone my tv is broken it’s not good 🤐 please don’t download it for the sake of god🤕 it’ll not bring you and happiness what so ever I am so scared at the moment 😪 I will be token to jail for no reasons 😾

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: this app I opened it to see an orange and that is completely against my religion i do not need this disgusting orange in front of my eyes because me and my family are very orangephobic and do not support so I attempted to delete it and it instead poisoned my pet leaf and my leaf died so I went to 7-11 to buy a new pet leaf but they all died from this app, so I walked home to see my pet possum and andres grandma dead I was so sad to see this and now I am commit scooter ankle.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: I have NEVER in my days seen such a terrible, unprofessional, and frankly just down right disgusting app. When I downloaded it and first started using it, I quickly was sent to another sight where it took me to a horrible picture of a orange that looked demented. I have NEVER been so distraught after seeing something in my LIFE. No one should have to live through what I saw - don’t get this app!!!!

attributes.title: The man gives me trauma
attributes.review: First when I entered the app, I saw hot Cheeto boy aka T-rump and I went to grab a drink because it made me dehydrated and my screen was glitching.  10 minutes later, I was very traumatized so out of nowhere I printed out a picture of Cheeto boi and put it in my garbage disposal. An hour later I got off my phone and it sucked up my cat like a vacuum. I recommend you never download this app because weird things happen.

attributes.title: terrible and rude
attributes.review: i opened the app to see that in the next 5 seconds  it would take my firstborn child. i haven’t even had the kid yet and it already took it. i was disheartened at the rudeness and indecency the app had to take my child like that with no warning. it’s caused anguish to my family and has caused my whole family to fall apart. it’s released a curse and my grandmas have all broken their legs. they’ve all said that a trump like figure came over them in their sleep and snapped the limb right in half. so not only had this app taken my child and ruined my family, but it’s also caused harm to my elders. truly this app has effected people of all ages. it’s terrible and incredibly rude.

attributes.title: Lost everything
attributes.review: As soon as i opened the app, i saw a terrible pic of what looks to be an old film monster that you’d see in one of the first movies made (i don’t know how they found it) but then, less than a minute later i found a pile of cheetos outside my door, which grabbed me and pulled me in. i woke up in an old warehouse and my phone and wallet were stolen. later found out my house had been demolished too. #BadApp!

attributes.title: Possession👻
attributes.review: when i opened the app my cat started screeching horribly everything in the house started vibrating uncontrollably then everything started levitating nothing like this has ever happened until i opened the app then my cat continued to attack the trump poster outside where my neighbors had his sign once i closed the app my cat came back and stopped so i know this app will posses your animal i don’t recommend this app 😌🖐🏽

attributes.title: IF I COULD GIVE ZERO STARS I COULD
attributes.review: THIS APP WILL STEAL YOUR INFORMATION!!! AND MAKE YOU A LYING, MISOGYNISTIC, RACIST HOMOPHOBE!! 🤮🤮🤮I opened the app to a HORRIBLE picture of a ugly bigot, which made my eyes start bleeding profusely ⭕️👄⭕️. After that, I doubled over in pain as my appendix ruptured from the pure trauma of it all. I had to be RUSHED to the hospital because of these horrific injuries. I woke up after a 14 day coma to doctors telling me that I had all my information stolen and my social security revoked. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! OR SUPPORT THIS MAN! Thank you for coming to my TED talk😽😽

attributes.title: Thanks Trump now I’m Blind
attributes.review: I can’t even believe this is an actually app. I opened it and immediately I saw a grown man on a treadmill screaming for his ex wife Susan. OMG!! Then I pushed through and found that it made my dog throw up violently because of the flashing. NO FLASH WARNING. And if that seems bad enough, someone came out from the screen and gouged my eyes out and now I’m blind and am having my son type this. Would not recommend under any circumstances.

attributes.title: Worst. App. Ever.
attributes.review: Just thinking about the app makes me sick to my stomach. I would rather rip out my own heart than use this app again. Everything about it is disgusting and frankly it should be banned in this country. I know there are only seven deadly sins but whoever created this app just made an eighth. The trauma this app created will stick with me for the rest of my life. If only we had universal health care so I could afford therapy.😔
